name: 2024 International Conference on Innovative Education and Learning Resources
content: Publication: The accepted and registered papers will be published in: International Journal of Information and Education Technology ISSN: 2010-3689 (Online) Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (CiteScore 2022: 2.0), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Google Scholar International Journal of Learning and Teaching ISSN: 2377-2891(Print); 2377-2905(Online) Abstracting/Indexing: Google Scholar; Crossref, CNKI, etc.
